title: Creamy Courgette Lasagne
ingredients: ['9 sheets dried lasagne sheets', '1 tablespoon sunflower or olive oil + extra for drizzling', '1 onion, finely chopped', '700g courgettes (about 6), coarsley grated', '2 cloves garlic, crushed', '200g ricotta cheese', '50g Cheddar cheese, grated', '350g jar of tomato sauce for pasta']
